game.name: Petrified Pawns
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "왕좌에 이르기까지, 쓰러지지 말고 수많은 체스판을 정복하세요. 마법과 무기를 활용해 전세를 뒤집고, 최적의 병력을 구축하세요. 성과 던전 깊숙이 들어갈수록, 사악한 괴물들과 거대한 거인들이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다"
game.shortDescriptionEn: Defeat chessboard after chessboard without dying on your path to the throne. Use magic and weapons to your advantage. Build the optimal army. Face evil monsters and giants as you venture deeper into the castle.

reviewHighlights.text: This is too chess what balatro is to Poker xD fun Indie game.
Your game deserves more attention. It's very well done.
